name: Adidas Blue Sneakers
description: This summer, boots by Jette made from high quality suede leather are real gems. They visually highlight the craftsmanship and fine leather braid positioned at the top of the shaft
shortDescription: High quality suede leather boots with fine craftsmanship
features: Breathable Leather Lining
High Quality Suede Material
Fine Craftsmanship
Comfortable Fit
Durable Construction

name: Silverlit - O.P. One - For 8 Years plus - Boys
description: Enjoy amazing robotic fun with OP ONE Robot! It's the programmable robot with lively actions. Featuring various intelligent functions including LED eyes, lively motion, sound detection, live broadcast, motorized arms and more, your child will be entertained with this robot companion for hours on end.
shortDescription: Programmable robot with LED eyes, motorized arms, and voice changer effects
features: Programmable with lively actions
LED Eyes - Scanning & Flashing light effect
Motorized Arms - Can lift-up objects with both hands
Lively Motion - All direction head movement with sound detection
Live Broadcast - Talk via controller and broadcast messages
5 different real-time voices with voice changer knob

specifications.Safety Warning: Not suitable for children under 3 years

name: Silverlit - Robo Dackel R - Boys - For 5 years and above
description: Challenge all terrain 360Â° Even bigger than the 360 Cross, the 360 Tornado performs impressive stunts for maximum sensation! A thrilling acceleration, the tyres that take all the bumps, a two-sided driving system, nothing resists this car.
shortDescription: Remote controlled smart dog that behaves like a real dog with sound and light effects
features: Robo Dackel Generation 2 - Super remote controlled smart dog
Super cute and reacts like a real dog
Runs behind bullet-shaped remote control
Follows master like a real dog
Tail and tongue move with sound and light effects
Reacts to gestures with touch sensors and motion

specifications.Safety Warning: Not suitable for children under 3 years

name: Silverlit - Robo Beats - Boys - For 5 years and above
description: Your 18.5 cm articulated robot is a real dancer: it moves arms and legs in the rhythm of the music. Touch the head to activate DJ mode and mix the sounds live! Sound and light effects. Batteries: 3 x AA (not included). 3 years and up.
shortDescription: Articulated dancing robot with DJ mode and sound/light effects
features: YCOO - Robo Beats: Unique robot with stylish futuristic design
Moves arms and legs like a real dancer in rhythm of music
Touch the head to switch to DJ mode
Mix sounds and create mood
Sound and light effects for more fun
Perfect gift for children (3 x AA batteries not included)

specifications.Safety Warning: Not suitable for children under 3 years

name: Zuru Robo Alive - Robotic Dinosaur - T-Rex - Series 2 - Colors may vary - Boys
description: Beware. This Dino is really alive. Zuru's new Robo Alive attacking T-Rex Stomps and walks with real dinosaur movement. It even bites and roars and has super realistic Eyes that look alive. So watch out, this is no ordinary pet. comes in two different colors. Batteries not included.
shortDescription: Realistic robotic T-Rex dinosaur that stomps, walks, bites and roars
features: ROBO ALIVE DINO: This Dino is really alive!
Attacking T-Rex stomps and walks with real Dinosaur movement
Bites and roars with super realistic eyes that look alive
Comes with Surprise Dino Slime!
Light reflecting eyes and glow in the dark scar
Package includes: 1 x Robo Alive T-Rex (Green), 1 x Instruction Manual
